entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 20. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing overnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Temperature steady near minus 20. Wind chill near minus 29. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 16. Wind chill near minus 29. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 23. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness overnight then 40 percent chance of flurries before morning. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 27 in the evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Saturday 18 February 2023
